abstract: The Brazilian investment firm 3G has succeeded so far in rationalizing operations at Heinz, Burger King and other companies. Kraft is next.
snippet: The Brazilian investment firm 3G has succeeded so far in rationalizing operations at Heinz, Burger King and other companies. Kraft is next.
lead_paragraph: H.J. Heinz’s operating margins rose to 26 percent from 18 percent after 3G Capital and Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway took the ketchup maker private two years ago. In welcoming a merger that creates a company worth perhaps $80 billion, Kraft Foods investors are betting on more of the same.

headline.main: Kraft’s Investors Bet on Same Formula That Helped Heinz
